thread.title: Real Madrid have already lined-up a replacement for Pepe as they look to bring in Porto star Felipe Monteiro in the summer

author: mheathsmith
title: Real Madrid have already lined-up a replacement for Pepe as they look to bring in Porto star Felipe Monteiro in the summer
text:
EFL Mad monty Real Madrid have already lined-up a replacement for Pepe as they look to bring in Porto star Felipe Monteiro in the summer 
The Portuguese 34-year-old is looking like he will leave the Spanish club in the next transfer window, and Zinedine Zidane has been quick to identify the man he wants Gossip 15th March 2017, 6:59 pm Updated: 15th March 2017, 8:04 pm
